title: Random FPS spikes?
body:
Hey guys.
Sorry if this is the wrong section but I'm just wondering if this is happening with anyone else-
My laptop has a pretty good setup and this has never happened before but my FPS would casually just break down to like 10 and my game would go nuts with lag. I'm usually able to reach a top of like 150-200 so I don't know what's up. FPS is directed to your computer (right?) and even though my router has been screwing up lately, it shouldn't be that...I think.

Anyone have an idea what this is and how to fix it?

Thanks a lot! :)

replies.body: You aren't the only one. Since the Maokai and Zz'rot portal hotfi I have been having FPS issues.
I get random ping spikes, not fps though. Fps is probably something with either the computer or the client. Try doing a repair on the client i guess...
